The secure clasp is gentle on clothes, and the silicone cord is easy to attach to almost any pacifier, teether or small toy. This adorable sweetie strap is the perfect combination of fashion and function!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Keep pacifiers, teethers and small toys in place with this adorable silicone pacifier clip! About Our Brand Itzy Ritzy takes pride in offering stylish solutions to every day parenting challenges. Our product line includes diaper bags, breastfeeding scarfs, reusable snack bags, shopping cart covers and much more. From multi-purpose designs that empower to chic prints that inspire, we've reinvented practical luxury for modern families around the world while remaining true to our core vision of keeping things simple. Itzy Ritzy Silicone Beaded Pacifier Clips An adorable way to always have a pacifier within reach! Say goodbye to lost pacifiers! Our sweetie strap is made of 100% food grade silicone and keeps pacifiers in place while also looking stylish with its one-piece beaded design. The secure clasp is gentle on clothes, and the silicone cord is easy to attach to almost any pacifier, teether or small toy. This adorable sweetie strap is the perfect combination of fashion and function! Our pacifier clips are made of 100% food grade silicone Metal clasp is strong and secure without damaging fabric The beaded look creates a stylish element while adding safety with its one-piece design
Attaches to Nearly Any Pacifier These silicone pacifier clips can attach to the handle of almost any pacifier, teether or small toy to keep them within reach and off of the floor.
Beaded Strap Design Safer than individual beads, our silicone pacifier strap gives a beaded appearance while being made of a one-piece design.
Attach to More Than Just Pacifiers! Our beaded straps can be used to keep teethers, small toys, loveys and so much more off the ground and within baby's reach!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Itzy Ritzy Silicone Pacifier Clip has been a real game-changer for us as parents. It's a simple yet incredibly handy accessory. The silicone clip is not only stylish but also incredibly functional.The clip is sturdy and holds onto the pacifier securely. We no longer worry about our baby's pacifier falling on the floor or getting lost. The length of the clip is perfect - long enough to reach the baby's mouth comfortably but not too long to become a safety hazard.One of the standout features is the versatility of this clip. It can also be used to attach toys or teething rings, which is fantastic for keeping our little one engaged and happy. Plus, the vibrant colors and modern designs make it a stylish addition to our baby's attire.The silicone material is easy to clean and is free from harmful chemicals. This gives us peace of mind, knowing that our baby is safe from any potential toxins.Overall, the Itzy Ritzy Silicone Pacifier Clip is a must-have for any parent. It's a functional, stylish, and safe accessory that has made our lives much more convenient and our baby happier. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best paci clips around
reviews.reviewText: Itzy Ritzy paci clips are honestly the best pacifier clips, hands down. They are super cute and they double as a teething toy. My babies have loved these paci clips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is strong and cute product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and multiple uses
reviews.reviewText: This is my second one I got because I lost my first one and struggled badly without it it’s a cute way to hold the pacifier but also great for teething she loves to grab it and chew it and you can’t even tell no teeth marks at all plus because it’s silicone it’s so easy to wash the cloth ones take a while to dry after but this one is quick to dry even if I don’t have it clipped to her I keep to clip on because it’s easier to find I loose it in the bed in the night it’s so much easier to find then just the small pacifier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love; But Needs Improvement
reviews.reviewText: This pacifier clip is a really good clip and serves its purpose well. It has been extremely helpful with teething and stays attached to babys clothes despite their strong grip and tugs. And it's silicone design is better than fabic clips that can hold bacteria. However there is room for improvement for longevity. After 2 months of usage there is constant rusting of the metal. It's shiny metal end is enticing and has become my baby's favorite part of the clip. Because of the constant saliva and water from washing it, you get a green rust, similar to fake jewelry turning your ear, especially at the point where it connects to the silicone. This product would be better if the end of made of stainless steel or even plastic rather than its copper penny material. I will be replacing it and wish it could have lasted a little bit longer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality Pacifier Holder
reviews.reviewText: This pacifier holder is hard to beat. The silicone is durable, even with a baby tugging and pulling on it. The clip is also durable and holds a firm grip to prevent the pacifier from falling off. Also love the variety of colors they offer. Definitely a must have!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as expected
reviews.reviewText: my six month old loves this, works well with pacifier and is a good teether. does tend to come unclipped though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The look is very cute and I love the color! Easy to clean and attach to the pacifier. My only knock on this is that the clip does not secure very well. I clip it to my daughters top and she easily pulls it off or moves and it slips off if there is some friction. She is 5 months old, for reference. I may try to bed the clip a bit with a pliers so it clips tighter. It falls on the ground less, but doesn’t quite fix the problem.
